value.description:
Colt 1873 Revolver had excellent stopping power, reliability, and simple operation.
It was slow to reload and its single-action firing mechanism meant it had a slow rate of fire..

M1911 Pistol is a single-action, semi-automatic, magazine-fed, recoil-operated pistol chambered for the 9×19mm Parabellum cartridge.
1911 is one of the most comfortable handguns ever made. Its mainspring housing, beavertail grip safety, single stack mag well, clean and crisp factory trigger, and simple sight picture just make it a dream to shoot. Its all-metal construction makes the gun feel weighted, but not heavy.

The Remington Model 870 is a pump-action shotgun manufactured by Remington Arms Company, LLC.
It is widely used by the public for sport shooting, hunting, and self-defense and used by law enforcement and military organizations worldwide. Sporting a 12 Gauge Slug makes it a deadly tool in close quarter combat.

Saiga-12 is a magazine-fed fully automatic shotgun.
Even having low range, this weapon can destroy anything in close quarter situations.

The Lee–Enfield is a bolt-action, magazine-fed repeating rifle that served as the main firearm used by the military forces.
Lee–Enfield rifles are still popular in the Rimworld, despite the presence and ready availability of more modern weapons.

The SAF is a blowback-operated select-fire gun, firing from a closed bolt.
The FAMAE SAF submachine gun is produced and manufactured by FAMAE .40 S&W ammunition gives the SAF quite the punch.

TEC-9 a blowback-operated line of semi-automatic pistols.
The simple design of the gun made it easy to repair and modify. The TEC-9 developed a negative reputation for its association with organized crime, street gangs and mass shootings.

The DPM aka Degtyaryov machine gun s a light machine gun firing the 7.62×54mmR (Rimmed) cartridge that was primarily used by the Soviet Union.
With various modifications it was used in aircraft as a flexible defensive weapon, and it equipped almost all Soviet tanks in WWII as either a flexible bow machine gun or a co-axial machine gun controlled by the gunner.

M16A2 Rifle is versatile, highly accurate and offers good fire power in any battlefield.
M16 entered US military service was deployed for jungle warfare operations during the Vietnam War.

The Remington Model 700 is a long range bolt-action with 5-round internal magazine which were introduced as military sniper rifles choice.
It has very fast reload time, very fast drawing speed, and noticeably lightweight. The rifle is modified with a scope.
